SERVICES_PAGE.PROTECT_YOUR_BUSINESS: Protect your business with consultations, document verification and a counterparty profile. Develop it with FUIB
SERVICES_PAGE.DO_NOT_WASTE_TIME: Do not waste time searching for specialists or visiting offices. No need to keep a specialist on staff - our advisors will be able to conduct an online consultation
SERVICES_PAGE.THE_MAIN_ISSUES: The main issues that the adviser can solve:
SERVICES_PAGE.CHECK_BUSINESS_CONTRACT: Check the business contract and provide recommendations in accordance with applicable law
SERVICES_PAGE.HELP_TO_PREPARE_OR_AMEND: It will help to prepare or amend the necessary documents for doing business
SERVICES_PAGE.ADVISES_OTHER_LEGAL_ISSUES: Advises on other legal issues agreed with you
SERVICES_PAGE.EXPLAINS_PROCEDURE_TIMING: Explains the procedure for the timing of payment of tax obligations and reporting
SERVICES_PAGE.CONSULT_INDIVIDUAL_REQUESTS: He will consult on individual requests agreed with you in the framework of entrepreneurial activity
SERVICES_PAGE.CHECK_TRADE_CONTRACT: Check foreign trade contract and provide recommendations in accordance with currency legislation
SERVICES_PAGE.ADVISE_EXCHANGE_OPERATIONS: He will advise on foreign exchange operations: export / import, purchase / sale and crediting / writing off foreign currency
SERVICES_PAGE.MAKE_AMENDMENTS_DOCUMENTS: Will make amendments to the draft documents on trade
SERVICES_PAGE.HELP_NON-STANDARD_ISSUES: Will help on non-standard issues with the currency legislation
SERVICES_PAGE.SERVICE_PROVIDES_OPPORTUNITY: The service provides an opportunity in one click to get information on the activities of your business partner:
SERVICES_PAGE.STATUS_COUNTERPARTY: The status of the counterparty and its registration data
SERVICES_PAGE.NAME_FOUNDERS: Name of the founders and authorized persons
SERVICES_PAGE.INFORMATION_ABOUT_CURRENT_TAX: Information about the current tax system and the availability of tax debt
SERVICES_PAGE.PRESENCE_BAN_TENDER_ACTIVITIES: The presence of a ban on tender activities
SERVICES_PAGE.USE_CONVENIENT_ONLINE: Connect to the service and get:
SERVICES_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCESS: A reliable assistant in the creation and submission of reports to the bodies of the SFS, PF, FSS and Statistics
SERVICES_PAGE.ALWAYS_UP-TO-DATE_FORMS: Access to the regulatory framework and webinars
SERVICES_PAGE.BUDGET_RECONCILIATION: Reconciliation of settlements with the budget
SERVICES_PAGE.TECHNICAL_AND_INFORMATIONAL_SUPPORT: Technical and informational support (including online chat)
SERVICES_PAGE.EFFECTIVE_AND_FREE_CHANNEL: Effective and free channel for finding new customers
SERVICES_PAGE.IT_ALLOWS_YOU_TO_SHOW: It allows you to show information about your company on Google Maps and Search to users who are nearby
SERVICES_PAGE.ADD_YOUR_COMPANY: Add your company to Search and Google Maps
SERVICES_PAGE.BOOST_YOUR_SALES: Boost your sales with photos, special offers, and seasonal updates.
SERVICES_PAGE.COMMUNICATE_WITH_CUSTOMERS: Communicate with customers in the Feedback section to gain their trust
SERVICES_PAGE.LEARN_BASICS: Learn the basics of internet marketing. More details about Digital Workshop.
SERVICES_PAGE.GET_HELP: Get help with advertising settings * and a bonus of UAH 900 on ads from Google**
SERVICES_PAGE.FREE_HELP: *Free help with setting up and running AdWordsExpress advertising campaigns 0800503240 - Mon-Fri, 09: 00-18: 00. Provided that it is spent 20 UAH per day or more.
SERVICES_PAGE.FOR_NEW_USERS: **For new users of Google My Business and Google Ads, subject to advertising costs of 300 UAH.

CONTENT.DO_BUSINESS: Do business and the Bank will help in legal, accounting and foreign economic matters.
CONTENT.CHECK_INFORMATION: Verify information about your partners in government registries.
CONTENT.COMPILE_REPORT: Compile and submit PE reports online with feedback
CONTENT.EFFECTIVE_FREE_CHANNEL: An effective and free channel for finding new customers along with FUIB and Google
